Light of Life by Dexter Britain

You can download this album for free at http://dexterbritain.bandcamp.com/album/light-of-life Join me on Facebook for more music: facebook.com/thedexterbritain

item.title: Evernote and the Brain: Designing Creativity Workflows - Evernote Blog
item.description:
Evernote and the Brain: Designing Creativity Workflows - Evernote Blog

One of the classic debates for Evernote organization essentially is, 'to tag or not to tag.' From Michael Hyatt to Thomas Honeyman, thousands upon thousands of you have relied on tags as your primary organizational system. But, the power of Evernote is in its flexibility. Tiago Forte offers up a different approach.

item.title: No title
item.description: I'm confident humans don't get the real meaning of infinity. they think it is something that has no limits, so it infinite. how far from the truth: something is infinite when it transmutates back into itself. another way of expression: it is infinite because it has no ends.

item.title: Why Design Matters
item.description:
Why Design Matters

"What we design, designs us back." Join Jason Silva as he freestyles complex systems of society, technology and human existence and discusses the truth and beauty of science in a form of existential jazz. Subscribe now!
